Package org.esigate.servlet.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DriverSelector
    This class handles support of legacy options for Driver selection.
    HttpServletSession
    Encapsulates servlet containes HttpSession mechanism.
    RequestFactory
    Converts the HttpServletRequest to an IncomingRequest.
    RequestUrl
    Utility class to work with Servlet request urls.
    ResponseCapturingWrapper
    Wrapper to the HttpServletResponse that intercepts the content written in order to build an HttpResponse.
    ResponseSender
    Renders a response to the HttpSerlvetResponse.
